song.eTitle: I CRY ALOUD TO THE LORD -- Psalm 142, NIV

verses.verse: I cry to you, 0 Lord; I say, "You are my refuge, my portion in the land of the living." Listen to my cry, for I am in desperate need; rescue me from those who pursue me, for they are too strong for me.
Set me free from my prison, that I may praise your name. Then the righteous will gather about me because of your goodness to me.
